downloadTitle: Slide Presentation for "TechNet Webcast: Information About Microsoft Project and Project Server Cumulative December 2010 Update (Level 200)"
downloadDescription: This is a slide presentation for the TechNet Webcast about the Project Server Cumulative Update for December 2010
detailsSection: This download contains the slide presentation for the Microsoft TechNet Webcast Information About Microsoft Project and Project Server Cumulative December 2010 Update (Level 200). You can view the Webcast from the Microsoft Events and Webcast page. For information about Project and Project Server Cumulative December 2010 Updates, see the TechNet knowledge base article, Office 2010 Cumulative Updates for December 2010. For more information about the latest Project Server 2010 Cumulative Updates, see the Updates for Project Server 2010 Resource Center.
systemRequirementsSection: To read the presentations, you must have Microsoft PowerPoint 2010, Office PowerPoint 2007, or PowerPoint Viewer 2007.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the files to your computer. Open a file in PowerPoint to view it.
